name: Export SE Ranking Keyword Data to Google Sheets
description:
This template streamlines your SEO reporting by connecting SE Ranking to Google Sheets. The automation is triggered to look up specific keywords in SE Ranking, including their ranking data, related keywords, and search suggestions. It then iterates through this information and neatly organizes it into three distinct Google Sheets. This is perfect for agencies or SEO specialists who need to regularly track and report on keyword performance without manual exporting and data entry. You can easily adapt it to your specific SE Ranking projects and Google Drive folders.

To get started, you can copy the structure of the Google Sheet document from here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wz1TsPvaqlKtf_zxIEXISbyb3AmfhSjuC9l6xHohxck/edit?gid=686447765#gid=686447765.
